resources.protalIntroText2: Invite friends to your Wish List and make shopping decisions together.
resources.headingText: The Wish List owner wants you to join a Wish List.
resources.portalIntroText1: Find great products at <Your Store URL> today!
resources.bulletText: As a member of a Wish List, you'll be able to add products, comments, and make shopping decisions together!
resources.introText: You should automatically be redirected to the Wish List.  If not, accept the invitation again from Facebook.
